verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
He is exalted
The King is exalted on high
I will praise Him

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He is exalted
forever exalted
and I will praise His name

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
He is the Lord
Forever His truth shall reign
Heaven and Earth
Rejoice in His holy name
He is exalted
The King is exalted on high
